author: Roman VeselÃ½
name: Krystal
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/buttons/maximize":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/buttons/maximize","caption":"{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/images/maximize-tiddler}} maximize tiddler","description":"Make tiddler full-width","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar $:/tags/EditToolbar","text":"<$button tooltip="Make tiddler full-width" aria-label="maximize tiddler" class=<>> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-maximize" $param=<>/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/images/maximize-tiddler}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> maximize tiddler "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/images/maximize-tiddler":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/images/maximize-tiddler","tags":"$:/tags/Image","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":""},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/changelog":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/changelog","text":"All notable changes to this project will be documented here. The format is based on [[Keep a Changelog|https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/]], and this project adheres to [[Semantic Versioning|https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html]]. !! [0.6.1] - 2025-03-15 !!! Changed * Move Horizontal story river to a Layout. ** So it can works alone side any other layout, reduce conflict with other plugins. ** Updated core compatibility to TiddlyWiki version `5.1.23` (where the [ext[Layouts|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Alternative%20page%20layouts]] were introduced) and higher. * Minor adjustments in the Installation instructions for clarity. * Extract backlink to a standalone plugin [[inverse-link-and-folder|$:/plugins/linonetwo/inverse-link-and-folder]], so it can be easily customized. Works without the krystal plugin. Also, krystal can work with other backlink plugins. * Add compatibility to many other plugins to reduce conflict. !! [0.5.2] - 2024-02-24 !!! Fixed * Tiddler backlinks do not contain system tiddlers ([[#56|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/pull/56]]) thanks [[@lucible|https://github.com/lucible]] !! [0.5.1] - 2022-08-28 !!! Fixed * Header overlapping stacked tiddlers on the right side ([[#48|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/48]]) thanks [[@ericworks|https://github.com/ericworks]] * Tiddlers frame effects during fast scrolling ([[#47|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/47]]) thanks [[@hukacode|https://github.com/hukacode]] !!! Changed * Update TiddlyWiki to version `5.2.3`, see the official [[Changelog|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Release%205.2.3]] !! [0.5.0] - 2022-03-13 !!! Added * Info about [[backlinking possibilities|https://crazko.github.io/krystal/#Bi-directional%20links]] * Changelog is part of the plugin * Tag {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/header-small||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} to [[customize sections in header|https://crazko.github.io/krystal/#Customizable%20header]] for small viewport ([[#32|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/32]]) !!! Changed * Update TiddlyWiki to version `5.2.1`, see the official [[Changelog|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Release%205.2.1]] !!! Fixed * "Sidebar" tiddlers not rendered correctly in TW 5.2.1 ([[#39|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/39]]) * "Sidebar" tiddlers titles show caption instead of system name ([[#31|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/31]]) * Width & scrolling in Firefox ([[#35|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/35]]) * Searchfield width during searching ([[#30|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/30]]) !! [0.4.0] - 2021-04-21 !!! Added * Option to show/hide tiddler's backlinks in [[settings|$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/settings]] ([[#29|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/29]]) !! [0.3.4] - 2021-01-26 !!! Fixed * Tiddler's title is not displayed correctly ([[#13|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/13]]) thanks [[@ericworks|https://github.com/ericworks]] !! [0.3.3] - 2021-01-23 !!! Fixed * Maximized tiddler above header dropdowns ([[#21|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/21#issuecomment-759085177]]) !! [0.3.2] - 2021-01-05 !!! Changed * Update TiddlyWiki to version `5.1.23`, see the official [[Changelog|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Release%205.1.23]] !!! Fixed * Searchbox results not displayed in new version of TiddlyWiki ([[#22|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/22]]) !! [0.3.1] - 2020-10-01 !!! Fixed * Scrolling to newly opened tiddlers when they do not fit into the view ([[#3|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/3]]) !! [0.3.0] - 2020-08-22 !!! Added * Add option to maximize tiddler width ([[#6|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/6]]) !! [0.2.1] - 2020-08-03 !!! Fixed * Tiddlers do not overflow when statically exported ([[#9|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/9]]) !! [0.2.0] - 2020-07-02 !!! Changed * Hide "Links to this note" box when there are no backlinks to the current tiddler !! [0.1.7] - 2020-06-28 !!! Changed * New possibilities of [[Customizable header|https://crazko.github.io/krystal/#Customizable%20header]] ([[#8|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/8]]) !! [0.1.6] - 2020-06-27 !!! Added * Tiddlers styling options (width & padding), see [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/settings]] ([[#7|https://github.com/crazko/krystal/issues/7]]) ... previous versions changelog not provided."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/close":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/close","text":"enable"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/highlight":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/highlight","text":"enable"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/tiddlerpadding":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/tiddlerpadding","text":"42"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/tiddlerwidth":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/tiddlerwidth","text":"600"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/header-small":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/header-small","tags":"$:/tags/KrystalPageTemplate","list":"$:/core/ui/SideBarSegments/site-title $:/core/ui/SideBarSegments/site-subtitle $:/core/ui/SideBarSegments/page-controls $:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/headertools $:/core/ui/SideBarSegments/search","list-before":"$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/topleftbar","text":"

story view for tiddlers. This version refactor the horizontal view to a layout, reduce the conflict with other plugins, and allow you switch between Standard layout (card view) and this horizontal view. Fork from https://github.com/crazko/krystal Made by [[Roman VeselÃ½|https://romanvesely.com/]] - {{$:/core/images/github}} [[@crazko|https://github.com/crazko]], {{$:/core/images/twitter}} [[@rmnvsl|https://twitter.com/rmnvsl]] "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/search":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/search","tags":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/header $:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/header-small","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"{{$:/core/ui/SideBarSegments/search}}"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/settings":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/settings","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance","caption":"Krystal","text":"|<$link to="$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/close">Close tiddlers to the right|<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/close" field="text" checked="enable" unchecked="disable" default="enable">| |<$link to="$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/config/highlight">Highlight open tiddlers links

0 0}.krystal-header>h1{font-size:1.5rem}@media (min-width:960px){.krystal-header--small{display:none}.krystal-header--big{display:flex}.krystal-header{flex-wrap:wrap;align-items:center;text-align:inherit}.krystal-header>*+*,.krystal-header>*+.tc-btn-invisible{margin:0 0 0 1em}}","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/styles/header.css.tid":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/styles/header.css.tid","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"\rules "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/styles/river.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/krystal/styles/river.css","text":".krystal-container .tc-tiddler-frame{border:none;border-radius:0;box-shadow:none;margin:0;flex-shrink:0;overflow-y:auto;display:flex;flex-direction:column;position:sticky}.krystal-container .tc-alerts+p{margin:0}@media (min-width:960px){.krystal-container .tc-dropzone{height:100vh;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.krystal-container .tc-story-river{padding:0;display:flex;overflow-y:hidden;height:100%;margin-right:0}.krystal-container .tc-story-river::before{content:"";position:absolute;top:0;left:0;height:100%;width:calc(var(--tiddler-width) * var(--tiddler-count));z-index:-1}.krystal-container .krystal--static .tc-story-river{max-height:100vh}.krystal-container .tc-tiddler-frame{border:none;padding:var(--tiddler-padding);width:var(--tiddler-width)}.krystal-container .tc-tiddler-frame>*{transition:opacity .25s}.krystal-container .krystal-tiddler__frame--hide>:not(.krystal-tiddler__title){opacity:0}.krystal-container .krystal-tiddler__frame--overlay{box-shadow:0 0 1em rgba(0,0,0,.125)}.krystal-container .krystal-tiddler__frame--maximized{left:0!important;right:0!important;bottom:0;width:100%;z-index:5}.krystal-container .tc-tiddler-frame:first-of-type{left:calc(0 * var(--tiddler-padding))}.krystal-container .tc-tiddler-frame:nth-of-type(2){left:calc(1 * var(--tiddler-padding))}.krystal-container .tc-tiddler-frame:nth-of-type(3){left:calc(2 *
